config_description: Enables creation of transiently replicated keyspaces on this node. Transient replication is experimental and is not recommended for production use.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'enable_transient_replication' is checked in the code to determine if transient replication is enabled in the system. If transient replication is required for a particular keyspace, this configuration needs to be enabled in the cassandra.yaml file.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'enable_transient_replication' configuration depends on the usage of transient replication in the keyspaces. Whenever a keyspace with transient replication is created or modified, this configuration is checked to ensure transient replication is enabled.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'enable_transient_replication' configuration option is significant as it determines whether transient replication can be used in the system. Enabling transient replication can have implications on data replication strategies and performance, especially in experimental or non-production environments.
